nodes.name: Ownable

nodes.documentation:
@dev The Ownable constructor sets the original `owner` of the contract to the sender
account.
@return the address of the owner.
nodes.name: owner

nodes.documentation: @dev Throws if called by any account other than the owner.
nodes.name: onlyOwner

nodes.documentation: @return true if `msg.sender` is the owner of the contract.
nodes.name: isOwner
renounceOwnership

nodes.documentation:
@dev Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.
@param newOwner The address to transfer ownership to.
nodes.name: transferOwnership

nodes.documentation:
@dev Transfers control of the contract to a newOwner.
@param newOwner The address to transfer ownership to.
nodes.name: _transferOwnership

nodes.documentation:
@title Roles
@dev Library for managing addresses assigned to a Role.
nodes.name: Roles

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (struct Roles.Role storage pointer,address) view returns (bool)

nodes.documentation: @dev give an account access to this role
nodes.name: add

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (struct Roles.Role storage pointer,address) view returns (bool)

nodes.documentation: @dev remove an account's access to this role
nodes.name: remove

nodes.documentation:
@dev check if an account has this role
@return bool
nodes.name: has

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (struct Roles.Role storage pointer,address) view returns (bool)

nodes.documentation:
@title Pausable
@dev Base contract which allows children to implement an emergency stop mechanism.
nodes.name: Pausable

nodes.documentation: @return true if the contract is paused, false otherwise.
nodes.name: paused

nodes.documentation: @dev Modifier to make a function callable only when the contract is not paused.
nodes.name: whenNotPaused

nodes.documentation: @dev Modifier to make a function callable only when the contract is paused.
nodes.name: whenPaused

nodes.documentation: @dev called by the owner to pause, triggers stopped state
nodes.name: pause

nodes.documentation: @dev called by the owner to unpause, returns to normal state
nodes.name: unpause
SimpleBet

nodes.documentation: @dev Constructor with contract deployment inital settings
@dev The fallback function (if player doesn't specify heads or tails) makes the default bet true (heads)
@dev The owner can add more bankroll to the contract when the contract is not paused (even if betting is disabled)
nodes.name: addBankroll

nodes.documentation:
@dev The owner can add more bankroll to the contract when the contract is not paused (even if betting is disabled)
 @param amount Value to be withdrawn in wei
nodes.name: withdrawBankroll

nodes.documentation: @dev Owner is able to disable betting when the contract is not paused
nodes.name: disableBetting_only_Owner

nodes.documentation: @dev Owner is able to enable betting when the contract is not paused
nodes.name: enableBetting_only_Owner

nodes.documentation: @dev A modifier that requires the betting to be enabled
nodes.name: onlyActive

nodes.documentation:
@dev Function ensures the bet size is in the valid range
 @return playerBetValue The accepted bet value
nodes.name: checkBetValue

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Previous bet has not been resolved."

arguments.value: Previous bet has not been resolved.

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Previous bet has not been resolved."

nodes.name: placeBet

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "No pending bets for this address"

arguments.value: No pending bets for this address

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "No pending bets for this address"

nodes.documentation:
@dev Fuction resolves the bet.
 @param playerBet Address of player who has made the bet
nodes.name: resolveBet

devdoc.details: Base contract which allows children to implement an emergency stop mechanism.

pause().details: called by the owner to pause, triggers stopped state

paused().return: true if the contract is paused, false otherwise.

unpause().details: called by the owner to unpause, returns to normal state
